articles.author: Published articles
articles.description: Outrage is like a lot of other things that feel good but over time devour us from the inside out. And it’s even more insidious than most vices because we don’t even consciously acknowledge that it’s a pleasure. — Tim Kreider
articles.title: Addiction to Outrage
